alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:49PM EDT until August 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... Central Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norman Park, or 9 miles northeast of Moultrie, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Moultrie, Adel, Lakeland, Sparks, Omega, Ray City, Norman Park, Lenox, Doerun, Riverside, Schley, Meigs, Berlin, Funston, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Greggs and Moultrie Municipal A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
